segments.text: Excuse me . Can you tell me how to get to City Hall ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Go to the next corner and turn left onto Center Street . Walk three blocks to Second Avenue and turn right . Walk two more blocks and you'll see City Hall on the left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I didn't follow you . Could you please repeat that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . First , go to the next corner and turn left onto Center Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , walk three blocks to Second Avenue an turn right . Are you with me so far ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , walk two more blocks an you â€™ ll see City Hall on the left . Have you got all that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Now I've got it . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
